name: multi-repo-branch-switcher
description: Effortlessly manages branch checkouts in a multi-repository workspace.

commands.title: Multi Repo Branch Switcher: Switch Branches
Multi-Repo Branch Switcher: Delete Stale Local Branches
Multi-Repo Branch Switcher: Switch to Default Branch

multiRepoBranchSwitcher.defaultBranchNam.description: Name of the default branch (e.g. 'main' or 'master').

multiRepoBranchSwitcher.registerChangesD.description: Delay (in milliseconds) after branch switch commands have finished before considering VSCode's source control management to be ready again.

enumDescriptions: Always reload the window after successful branch switches.
Ask whether to reload the window after successful branch switches.
Never reload the window after successful branch switches.
multiRepoBranchSwitcher.autoReloadWindow.description: Define whether to automatically reload the window after successful branch switches.

enumDescriptions: Always pull updates from remote branch after successful branch switches.
Ask whether to pull updates from remote branch after successful branch switches.
Never pull updates from remote branch after successful branch switches.
multiRepoBranchSwitcher.autoPullBranchUp.description: Define whether to automatically pull updates from remote branch after successful branch switches.

multiRepoBranchSwitcher.prune.cutoffDays.description: Number of days after which local branches are considered stale and eligible for deletion.

multiRepoBranchSwitcher.prune.protected.description: Array of regex patterns matching branch names that should never be deleted.

multiRepoBranchSwitcher.prune.dryRun.description: If true, only preview which branches would be deleted without actually deleting them.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
